titles: The moral philosophie of the Stoicks. Written in French, and englished for the benefit of them which are ignorant of that tongue. By T.I. fellow of New-Colledge in Oxford
author: Du Vair, Guillaume, 1556-1621.
Epictetus. Manual.
James, Thomas, 1573?-1629.
publisher: Printed by Felix Kingston, for Thomas Man,
notes: Translation of: Du Vair, Guillaume.  La philosophie morale des Stoiques.

Reproduction of the original in the Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
keywords: Conduct of life --  Early works to 1900.
